title: Total Abandonment
description: The drama is finally behind them.Nothing stands in Bryce and Sofia’s way…That’s until Sofia’s younger sister comes into the picture. What now?It’s all about Sofia…Does that still holds true when Sofia introduces Bryce to Ciara––her sizzling hot younger sister?Bryce seems mesmerized by Ciara.All men are.Sofia smells trouble.Every boyfriend she introduces to Ciara always falls for her ravishingly beautiful sibling.Why would Bryce be the exception?Will Sofia come in second place again and lose the man she loves?This is Part 4 of 4 of a perfect getaway filled with passion, steam and a twisty storyline that will keep you riveted until the fairytale ending!Get it now.
author: Scarlett Avery
